data.title: OpenAI
data.description: OpenAI is an AI research and deployment company. Our mission is to ensure that artificial general intelligence benefits all of humanity.

data.title: Gemini
data.description: Gemini is a regulated cryptocurrency exchange, wallet, and custodian that makes it simple and secure to buy bitcoin, ether, and other cryptocurrencies.

data.title: Nullface AI
data.description: Generate stunning narrated AI videos for Youtube, Instagram.

data.title: Faceless Video
data.description: Faceless .video creates content and posts it to your account every day. Our AI automated content creation tool converts text to video in minutes and posts

data.title: InVideo
data.description: Create faceless videos on any topic. The AI-powered faceless video generator churns out videos in seconds. Prompt invideo AI to make a video on travel, finance etc

data.title: VidIQ
data.description: vidIQ helps you acquire the tools and knowledge needed to grow your audience faster on YouTube and beyond. It can also help you in content creation.

data.title: Vimeo
data.description: Vimeo is a video hosting, sharing, and services platform. It is a video-sharing website in which users can upload, share and view videos.

data.title: Twitch
data.description: Twitch is a video live streaming service operated by Twitch Interactive, a subsidiary of Amazon. It is mainly used for video game live streaming.

data.title: YouTube
data.description: YouTube is an American online video-sharing platform headquartered in San Bruno, California. It is the second most visited website in the world.

data.title: Facebook
data.description: Facebook is an American online social media and social networking service. It is based in Menlo Park, California. It was founded by Mark Zuckerberg.

data.title: Instagram
data.description: Instagram is an American photo and video sharing social networking service owned by Facebook. It was created by Kevin Systrom and Mike Krieger.

data.title: Twitter
data.description: Twitter is an American microblogging and social networking service on which users post and interact with messages known as tweets.

data.title: LinkedIn
data.description: LinkedIn is an American business and employment-oriented online service that operates via websites and mobile apps. It was founded on December 28, 2002.

data.title: Reddit
data.description: Reddit is an American social news aggregation, web content rating, and discussion website. It was founded in 2005 by Steve Huffman and Alexis Ohanian.
